item.title: What's the mortgage interest rate forecast for fall 2025?
item.description: Homebuyers and owners looking to refinance are hoping for a mortgage rate drop this fall. Here's what to expect.

item.title: Quitâ€‘smoking ads are ending. A former smoker fears what comes next.
item.description: For 13 years, the CDC's "Tips" ads shared real stories and free quitline support. With funding ending, experts worry fewer people may quit.

item.title: U.S. markets hold steady in early trading Trump says he fired Lisa Cook
item.description: U.S. markets are holding steady Tuesday morning after President Trump attempts to fire Fed official Lisa Cook.

item.title: Democrats rally at DNC summer meeting
item.description: The Democratic National Committee began its summer meeting on Monday in Minneapolis. CBS News' Nidia Cavazos breaks down highlights from the first day...

item.title: Congress investigating D.C. police crime data after manipulation allegations
